/* WtprMtMap.SelectWtprMtList 수압계 목록*/
WITH C AS ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS ROWCNT FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PRGA_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= decode(length(#IST_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.IST_YMD <= decode(length(#IST_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.PGA_CDE = #PGA_CDE#
A.MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE#
A.PGA_DIP = #PGA_DIP#
A.PRD_NAM = #PRD_NAM#
)
SELECT C.ROWCNT, X.* FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY A.FTR_IDN DESC ) AS RN , A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , decode(length(A.IST_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(A.IST_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS IST_YMD , A.PGA_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250057' AND DTL_CD = A.PGA_CDE ) AS PGA_NAM , A.MOF_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250035' AND DTL_CD = A.MOF_CDE ) AS MOF_NAM , A.PGA_DIP , A.STD_SAF , A.AVG_SAF , A.MSR_SAF , A.PIP_DIP , A.PRD_NAM , A.PIP_CDE , A.PIP_IDN , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.ANG_DIR , CASE WHEN ST_ISVALID(A.GEOM) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_GEOMETRY FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PRGA_PS A WHERE 1=1
A.MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE#
A.FTR_IDN like #FTR_IDN# || '%'
A.HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE#
A.CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM#
A.SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM#
A.IST_YMD >= decode(length(#IST_YMD_FROM#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_FROM#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.IST_YMD <= decode(length(#IST_YMD_TO#), 10, to_char(to_date(#IST_YMD_TO#, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 'yyyyMMdd'), '')
A.PGA_CDE = #PGA_CDE#
A.MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE#
A.PGA_DIP = #PGA_DIP#
A.PRD_NAM = #PRD_NAM#
ORDER BY FTR_IDN DESC
) X JOIN C ON 1=1 WHERE RN <= ($page$+1) * $rows$ AND RN >= ($page$) * $rows$ + 1

/* WtprMtMap.SelectWtprMtDtl 수압계 상세정보*/
SELECT A.FTR_CDE , (SELECT FTR_NAM FROM INFOFMS.V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = A.FTR_CDE) AS FTR_NAM , A.FTR_IDN , A.HJD_CDE , (SELECT HJD_NAM FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = A.HJD_CDE) AS HJD_NAM , A.SHT_NUM , A.MNG_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250101' AND DTL_CD = A.MNG_CDE ) AS MNG_NAM , a.IST_YMD , A.PGA_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250061' AND DTL_CD = A.PGA_CDE ) AS GAG_NAM , A.MOF_CDE , (SELECT NM FROM INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO WHERE MST_CD = '250004' AND DTL_CD = A.MOF_CDE ) AS MOF_NAM , A.PGA_DIP , A.STD_SAF , A.AVG_SAF , A.MSR_SAF , A.PIP_DIP , A.PRD_NAM , A.PIP_CDE , A.PIP_IDN , A.CNT_NUM , A.SYS_CHK , A.ANG_DIR , decode(A.SYS_CHK,'1','유','무') as SYS_CHK_NAM FROM INFOFMS.WTL_PRGA_PS A WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
statements.update: INSERT INTO INFOFMS.WTL_PRGA_PS ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , IST_YMD , PGA_CDE , MOF_CDE , PGA_DIP , STD_SAF , AVG_SAF , MSR_SAF , PIP_DIP , PRD_NAM , PIP_CDE , PIP_IDN , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , ANG_DIR ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #IST_YMD# , #PGA_CDE# , #MOF_CDE# , #PGA_DIP# , #STD_SAF# , #AVG_SAF# , #MSR_SAF# , #PIP_DIP# , #PRD_NAM# , #PIP_CDE# , #PIP_IDN# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #ANG_DIR# )

/* 수압계 상세 수정 */ UPDATE INFOFMS.WTL_PRGA_PS SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , PGA_CDE = #PGA_CDE# , MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE# , PGA_DIP = #PGA_DIP# , STD_SAF = #STD_SAF# , AVG_SAF = #AVG_SAF# , MSR_SAF = #MSR_SAF# , PIP_DIP = #PIP_DIP# , PRD_NAM = #PRD_NAM# , PIP_CDE = #PIP_CDE# , PIP_IDN = #PIP_IDN# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR# WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#

MERGE INTO INFOFMS.WTL_PRGA_PS USING DUAL ON (FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HJD_CDE = #HJD_CDE# , SHT_NUM = #SHT_NUM# , MNG_CDE = #MNG_CDE# , IST_YMD = #IST_YMD# , PGA_CDE = #PGA_CDE# , MOF_CDE = #MOF_CDE# , PGA_DIP = #PGA_DIP# , STD_SAF = #STD_SAF# , AVG_SAF = #AVG_SAF# , MSR_SAF = #MSR_SAF# , PIP_DIP = #PIP_DIP# , PRD_NAM = #PRD_NAM# , PIP_CDE = #PIP_CDE# , PIP_IDN = #PIP_IDN# , CNT_NUM = #CNT_NUM# , SYS_CHK = #SYS_CHK# , ANG_DIR = #ANG_DIR#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , MNG_CDE , IST_YMD , PGA_CDE , MOF_CDE , PGA_DIP , STD_SAF , AVG_SAF , MSR_SAF , PIP_DIP , PRD_NAM , PIP_CDE , PIP_IDN , CNT_NUM , SYS_CHK , ANG_DIR ) VALUES ( #FTR_CDE# , #FTR_IDN# , #HJD_CDE# , #SHT_NUM# , #MNG_CDE# , #IST_YMD# , #PGA_CDE# , #MOF_CDE# , #PGA_DIP# , #STD_SAF# , #AVG_SAF# , #MSR_SAF# , #PIP_DIP# , #PRD_NAM# , #PIP_CDE# , #PIP_IDN# , #CNT_NUM# , #SYS_CHK# , #ANG_DIR# )
/* 수압계 상세 삭제 */ DELETE INFOFMS.WTL_PRGA_PS WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
